1.4.1.name: wordpress/blog-layouts
1.4.1.description:
To make your blog layout more attractive and colorful

Shortcodes

[wp_blog_layouts] - For listings on page or posts

Theme Functions

wp_blog_layouts() - For listings on page or posts

Support

So that others can share in the answer, please submit your support requests through the WordPress forums for Blog Layout.

If you want private or priority support, please donate.
